title: @Riot: What's with you & your fetish to constantly give Lux's ult cooldown refund buffs?
body: Why not just make her ult have a fixed 10 second cooldown or something? I don't see a difference in it.

That's not hot Ultimate Hat works. Ultimate Hat is multiplicative with normal CDR, not additive. 0.6x0.85=0.51, 1-0.51=0.49, 0.49-0.4=9%.
Ultimate Hat on a character with 40% CDR gives the ultimate 9% *more* CDR total.

You get 53.25% total cdr on your ultimate *if you have 45% cdr*.
